name: J&M TF 212
description:
Torsion‑Flex Soil Conditioners Designed to Perform, Built to Last

Flex your muscles the next time you’re working ground with a J&M torsion‑flex soil conditioner. The double basket design features a torsion‑flex arm that maintains proper ground tension and allows the basket to flex over uneven terrain. The result is a more consistent performance that levels and finishes the soil in one pass...preparing a more uniform seed bed composed of finer soil at planting depth to help retain proper moisture and large particles on top to reduce crusting.

I hope you all enjoy. This thing has been a huge PITA since FS19. I have finally got it to behave in a manner that I am comfortable to release it. Features 32 ft working width, 3 color configs,  X Fold,  Flex wings, baskets on joints so they will follow the ground, the baskets are also scripted as wheels so they turn your actual ground speed and not just a speed rotating part. This TF 212 pairs well behind machines like OS Farms Sunflower Cultivator, disks, etc.  

Thank you all for your continued support. It is great appreciated!
